page.title: 07THE YOUNG IN BISHOPS LYDEARD
page.content: There is every opportunity in the village for any youngster to participate in group activities should they wish to do so. There is a weekly Youth Club for 12 to 16 year olds held in the hall of the Primary School with many games and activities,also a wide range of activities at weekends or evenings outside the village.A similar Club has just started on Sunday evenings under the patronage of St.Mary's Church. In the Village Hall there are weekly Ballet lessons teaching a wide range of abilities. There are 4 Sunday School classes who meet in the Church Rooms and in the School during the Sunday morning service and then go to Church for the end of the service. Continued on Page 8.
